sections.title: Making the right call is priceless
sections.description: deX offers a free proof of concept so you can see our platform in action. Once it's proven its value, you will have affordable plans available

plans.Title: Free
plans.caption: For teams starting the data journey
plans.description: Facilitated trials to get you started

plans.Title: Startups
plans.caption: For teams growing with data
plans.description: Credit packages to help your startup reduce costs and accelerate time to value

plans.Title: Enterprise
plans.caption: For teams & orgs operating at scale
plans.description: Flexible pricing that scales with your business

link.text: See all features you can have

sections.title: Expert support to build a world-class data organization

heroSections.Title: Migration
heroSections.Text: Work with our experts to migrate your existing workflows to deX with minimal effort and time

heroSections.Title: Modeling
heroSections.Text: Collaborate with deX analytics engineers on advanced data modeling, pipeline design and optimization, metrics and dashboards

heroSections.Title: Validation
heroSections.Text: Get expert help to improve data quality and ensure data consistency throughout the data pipeline
